bibl.title: The Roman Textile Industry and Its Influence. A Birthday Tribute to John Peter Wild.
bibl.note: First Part. Roman Egypt and Nubia (5 papers).
WALTON ROGERS Penelope, Lise BENDER JØRGENSEN and Antoinette RAST-EICHER (Edd.), The Roman Textile Industry and Its Influence. A Birthday Tribute to John Peter Wild.
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 2001, 8°, xv-200 pp., tabl., figg. et 7 pll. coul. ISBN 1-84217-046-5. £18.
